Summary: lights slowly appearing one after another.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Landen
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was at work, delivery driver for a local pizzaria, and driving south on sr. 22\3 when i saw a single light appear almost directly ahead of me. i just happened to be looking at the right place at the right time. recently i had seen some aerial flares and thought it might be another set, but these lights stayed and didn't fade away. first there was a single light, and then a second in the 1:30 position of the first, followed by a third in the 4:30 position creating a perfect triangle. then a fourth popped up in the 1:30 position from the third, making a rhombus, and then a fifth from the 4:30 position of the fourth. i drove about a mile looking at these in the sky and it seemed they were moving away. i watched them until a traffic light made them very hard to see as they were getting lower and dimmer. total duration was around 2-3 mins. overall it was steady and held it's shape. there was around a 1 second delay before the second appeared. this interval was held constant for all additional lights.
